dictionary.lore: A treasure bearing the name of one of the continents of Grand Gaia. A mysterious and gigantic crater exists in Bariura, and it is believed that this gem had something to do with its birth.  By the time the Bariura Empire had been established the emperor was already in possession of this treasure, building a special room to safeguard the phantasmagoric gem. However, historical accounts claim that the gem was stolen shortly afterwards.
